name: AI Labor Syndicate - Follow-up Flow
description: Blueprint mapping of triggers and actions to implement in Zapier.

steps.action: Send SMS via Twilio to confirm appointment

Add to Mailchimp / ConvertKit and tag 'hot'
Send Thank You + Request Review (Google My Business)
